about_the_game:
A short, yet sweet and charming puzzle game about a girl named Aurora, who is trapped in a dreamy room filled with everything she could possibly desire. Explore her wonderland to find a way out and discover the true nature of this fantastical room. All dreams, good or bad, must come to an end... right?

Game contains some disturbing imagery and horror elements. Not for children or those who are easily disturbed.


A lost, introverted girl, who wishes to find out why she woke up in a mysterious room. Despite finding the room to be comfortable and homely, she is certain that something is amiss. Are her doubts just her imagination, or is something here terribly wrong?


Aurora's self-proclaimed butler, a posh and loyal bear-boy called Theodore. He seems to want the best for her, but how much can he really be trusted?​

BEDROOM:
A cute, pastel wonderland, waiting to be explored. What dark secrets are hidden among the innocent pink hues and comforting soft fabrics?​

FEATURES:
  • Point and click style gameplay
  • Visual novel style conversations
  • Adorable 2D artwork
  • 5+ CGs -Multiple endings
  •  Secrets & collectable unlockables
  • Achievements

DEV NOTE:
The game is free to play, but if you enjoyed it or feel like it's worth something, please buy the fan pack! I deeply appreciate your support and thank you so much for playing my game!

name: Yumemori

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 1.6GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Modern Intel/AMD CPU 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities. Anything made since 2004 should work.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
